original_text: It was autumn, so the king was sitting in the rooms that he used when it was cold. A fire was burning beside him.
korean_text: 그 때는 아홉째 달이라 왕이 겨울 궁전에 앉았고 그 앞에는 불 피운 화로가 있더라
